focal-cosine.quote: seresnext101 focalcos 512... VIT_base16 focalcos 384... efficientnet_b4_ns focalcos 384... regnety120 focalcos 512... focalcos loss will increase CV, but some models will reduce the prediction probability of true label.

knowledge-distillation.quote: the second submission: based on the prediction results of the first scheme, knowledge distillation is carried out, and the student model results and the teacher model results are weighted by a ratio of 4:6

data-removal.quote: images with prediction probability greater than 0.9 and incorrect predictions are deleted. PB 0.895

weighted-arithmetic-mean.quote: the second submission: based on the prediction results of the first scheme, knowledge distillation is carried out, and the student model results and the teacher model results are weighted by a ratio of 4:6

random-tta.quote: 3model and 5xrandomTTA... randomTTA is the same as the augmentation method in training, randomly 5 times... in my submit, when using random TTA, the score of PB and LB are close.
